rukus.text: geudeul-ui hyeongje hudeuga malhagil neohuineun hananim-eul dulyeowo haji anh neunyo
sillo naega neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
geulo inhayeo naega bosang-eul yoguhaji anihani naui bosang-eun man-yuui junim-eulobuteo issnola
neohuineun nop-eun gosmada gongheohanhyanglag-eul wihae geonmul-eul se-uneunyo
neohuineun tain-eul gong-gyeogham-e pog guncheoleom gong-gyeoghaessnola
hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-e ge sunjonghala
neohuiga algo issneun modeun geos eul jusin bun-eul dulyeowo hala
geubunkkeseoneun gachugdeulgwa jason deul-eul neohuiege jusyeoss-eumyeo
sillo naneun simpan-ui nal neohui ege naelyeojil beol-i dulyeobdoda
geudeul-i daedabhagil nega seolgyo hadeun anihadeun uliegeneun machanga jila
sillo igeos-eun yes seonjodeul-ui gwanseub-e bulgwahamyeo
ileohge geudeul-i geuleul bujeong hamae hananim-eun geudeul-eul myeolmangsikyeossno la geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hadeola
sillo geudaeui junim-eun jeonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
